pkgmetadata.longdescription: Geographically Weighted Elliptical Regression // Computes a elliptical regression model or a geographically weighted regression model with elliptical errors using Fisher's score algorithm. Provides diagnostic measures, residuals and analysis of variance. Cysneiros, F. J. A., Paula, G. A., and Galea, M. (2007) doi:10.1016/j.spl.2007.01.012.
